name: Fathead Crackers
instructions:
1) Preheat oven to 425 F and line a baking sheet with parchment paper
2) Put the mozzarella and cream cheese in a large microwave-safe mixing bowl and microwave for 30 seconds. Combine using a rubber spatula. Microwave for another 30 seconds, until the cheese has melted, then stir once more.
3) Add almond flour, egg, parsley and salt, and combine using a fork
4) Once the dough comes together, transfer it to lined baking sheet and place another piece of parchment paper on top. Roll out into a thin rectangle. Using a pizza cutter or a knife, cut the flattened dough into small crackers, about 1 inch
5) Bake for 6 to 10 minutes, until crackers have puffed up and browned

Note: The thiner your dough, the crunchier your crackers
additionalInfo: A friend gave me a book called by the KetoConnect couple. This crackers were one of the best founds in keto cousine because as they say: we all miss the crunch factor at some point.
